there is a strong presence of campus safety personnel. i have not personnal experienced any problems nor have i had of any incidents.
not involved in any; i am focusing on my academics
not involved in any; i am focusing on my academics.
students who are concerned with maintaining high gpa, but have developed good study habits.
the college provides a great deal of historical significance; pre-antebellum era.
my parents have shared that they are happy with the quality of education i am receiving based on the cost.
there are a variety of clubs, organizations and opportunities to start groups based on the student body areas of interest.
because i live at home, i have not experienced campus food and dining.
i am living at home. not applicable for me.
the expectation is for each student to put the necessary time into each course to ensure success. the instructors are available to provide clarification when needed.
the student population and classroom size provide for a great opportunity to transition into the college environment and academic success.

teacher student ratio makes it easier to access the teacher when the need arises. the instructors promote working group projects and teamwork. there are several organizations, clubs and opportunities to get involved in the life of the life of the campus

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Kasey from Milledgeville, GA 03/05/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 2 of 9 Categories Comments Campus Safety gmc has it's own campus security. they are actual police officers with mandate, but also we are with in walking distance of the downtown police station. Clubs and Activities at gmc milledgeville there are loads of different clubs and activities: gmc weekly (newspaper), history club, student government association, officers of christian fellowship, apo, art club, creative thinking club, pre-nursing club, humanist club, math club, rifle team, and many more. if you can think of it they have it, and if not then you can start it by stopping by the student activities center. Great for these types of students gmc is great for both traditional and non-traditonal students. Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus georgia military
